properties.body:
SOUTH AMERICA-SOUTHWEST COAST.
1. HYDROLANT 185/13(22) ANNOUNCED HORIZONTAL INACCURACIES IN
   DNC07 (24TH ED) GEN07A, GEN07B, COA07H, A0714100,
   A0714180 AND A0714185.
2. ON 12 APRIL 2013, NGA RELEASED DNC07 (25TH ED),
   CORRECTING THE INACCURACIES IN GEN07A, GEN07B,
   COA07H, A0714100, A0714180 AND A0714185.
3. FOLLOW STANDARD UPDATE PROCEDURES TO OBTAIN THE
   CORRECTED DATA.
4. DATA CAN BE OBTAINED VIA:
   (A) EDITION PATCH ONLY: HTTP:DNC.NGA.MIL/NGAPORTAL/DNC.PORTAL.
